amendment.description: To increase assistance to combat HIV/AIDS.

action.text: Amendment SA 2047 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2047 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 42 - 50. Record Vote Number: 431.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2047.
Amendment SA 2047 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13639-13644, S13645, S13646-13647; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13639) To increase assistance to combat HIV/AIDS.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2047 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 42 - 50. Record Vote Number: 431.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2047 proposed by Senator Durbin.
